thread.title: Ground News - Woman Opens Up About Turning From Witchcraft to Jesus
thread.title_full: Ground News - Woman Opens Up About Turning From Witchcraft to Jesus

author: Independent Journal Review
title: Ground News - Woman Opens Up About Turning From Witchcraft to Jesus
text:
Summary by Independent Journal Review A Texas woman opened up about turning away from witchcraft to follow Jesus Christ. In an interview with The Christian Post, Lindsay Smith, 24, revealed she was introduced to the occult by a guy she was dating in high school. “He actually started teaching me about astrology, Ancient Egypt, all of the things like the New Age and the witchcraft stuff. I ended up getting out of the relationship. It took me like nine months to get out,” she said. S… Share menu More
